channel.title: Deepfakes on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Deepfakes on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Is AI the New Frontier of Women’s Oppression?
item.description: In her new book, feminist author Laura Bates explores how sexbots, AI assistants, and deepfakes are reinventing misogyny and harming women.

item.title: Is AI the New Frontier of Women’s Oppression?
item.description: In her new book, feminist author Laura Bates explores how sexbots, AI assistants, and deepfakes are reinventing misogyny and harming women.

item.title: Here’s how deepfake vishing attacks work, and why they can be hard to detect
item.description: Why AI-based voice cloning is the next frontier social-engineering attacks.

item.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
item.description: Trump’s “AI Action Plan” reverses regulations, sparks critical pushback.

item.title: AI 'Nudify' Websites Are Raking in Millions of Dollars
item.description: Millions of people are accessing harmful AI “nudify” websites. New analysis says the sites are making millions and rely on tech from US companies.
